selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the division of total dots by number of groups to find dots per group.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric to perform the division operation: calc_numeric('4/2').

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to be returned.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use format_final to format the result from calc_numeric: format_final(result).
